reviewText: This is a story that made my then 7 year old daugther weep some years ago. The reason was most probably that we were stationed in Lesotho at the time, but it is a beautiful story about friendsip regardsless of the color of ones skin. It is an old film which of course shows.

I HAVE WATCHED THIS MOVIE SEVERAL TIMES AND LOVE IT MORE EACH TIME.  I HAVE SHARED IT WITH SEVERAL PEOPLE IN MY DEN AND IT IS SO O O O ENTERTAINING.  THE MOST HILARIOUS PART IS "SNIFFING THE BIRTH CONTROL PILLS", OTHERWISE, THE STORY IS KIND OF TRUE TO NATURE FOR THAT REGION.
